org.semanticweb.owlapi.util

Class CollectionFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.semanticweb.owlapi.util.CollectionFactory

  • public class CollectionFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Author: Matthew Horridge
    The University Of Manchester
    Bio-Health Informatics Group
    Date: 10-Jan-2007

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  CollectionFactory.ConditionalCopySet<T>
      a set implementation that uses a delegate collection for all read-only operations and makes a copy if changes are attempted.
      static class  CollectionFactory.ThreadSafeConditionalCopySet<T>
      this class behaves like ConditionalCopySet except it is designed to be threadsafe; multiple thread access is regulated by a readwritelock; modifications will create a copy based on SyncSet.

      • getCopyOnRequestSet

        public static <T> java.util.Set<T> getCopyOnRequestSet(java.util.Collection<T> source)
        Parameters:
        source - the collection to lazily copy
        Returns:
        a lazy defensive copy for source; the source collection will not be copied until a method that modifies the collection gets called, e.g., add(), addAll()

        Returns:
